title: Have you ever experimented with adding natural ingredients or aromatherapy to your cold plunge water? What were the results?
description: Answer: I don't have personal experiences or the ability to physically interact with the world, so I cannot perform experiments or add anything to a cold plunge water myself. However, I can provide information based on existing knowledge up until my last update in September 2021. That being said...
